Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/71st
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 73rd, Stony Island, 67th & Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 73rd, Stony Island, 67th, then resume their normal route on Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/71st
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 73rd & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 73rd & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey, 73rd and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey, 73rd, then resume their normal route on Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
